channel.title: IT Security on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in IT Security on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Qualys Logo
Qualys, Inc. provides cloud security, compliance and related services and is based in Foster City, California. Founded in 1999, Qualys was the first company to deliver vulnerability management solutions as applications through the web using a “software as a service” model, and as of 2013 Gartner Group for the fifth time gave Qualys a “Strong Positive” rating for these services. It has added cloud-based compliance and web application security offerings.
You can download theQualyslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Qualys
item.description: Qualys, Inc. provides cloud security, compliance and related services and is based in Foster City, California. Founded in 1999, Qualys was the first company to deliver vulnerability management solutions as applications through the web using a “software as a service” model, and as of 2013 Gartner Group for the fifth time gave Qualys a “Strong Positive” rating for these services. It has added cloud-based compliance and web application security offerings.
